com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service

Interface LockStatusService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LockStatusServiceImpl

    public interface LockStatusService
    The LockStatusService is an interface which defines services for user to acquire, release and getting the status of the lock. These services are used to apply business rules for locking mechanism for Ephesoft application features.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    LockStatusDao

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<LockStatus> acquireLock(LockStatus lockStatus)
      Acquires the lock on the particular application feature if it is not being locked.
      java.util.List<LockStatus> getAllFeaturesLockedByUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Returns the list of all the application features which are being locked by the userName passed.
      LockStatus getLockStatus(FeatureName featureName)
      Returns the instance of LockStatus for the given feature name.
      void releaseAllLocks(java.lang.String userName)
      Releases all the locks from the application features which are being locked by the userName.
      java.util.List<LockStatus> releaseLock(LockStatus lockStatus)
      Releases the lock depending on the Lock status.

    • Method Detail

      • acquireLock

        java.util.List<LockStatus> acquireLock(LockStatus lockStatus)
        Acquires the lock on the particular application feature if it is not being locked. This method returns list of all the features which are currently being locked by the user which is trying to acquire lock on the particular application feature.
        Parameters:
        lockStatus - LockStatus The instance of the LockStatus.
        Returns:
        List <{@link LockStatus}> The list of all the features which are currently being locked by the user which is trying to acquire lock on the particular application feature.

      • releaseLock

        java.util.List<LockStatus> releaseLock(LockStatus lockStatus)
        Releases the lock depending on the Lock status.
        Parameters:
        lockStatus - LockStatus
        Returns:
        List<LockStatus>

      • getLockStatus

        LockStatus getLockStatus(FeatureName featureName)
        Returns the instance of LockStatus for the given feature name.
        Parameters:
        featureName - FeatureName The name of the feature.
        Returns:
        LockStatus The instance of LockStatus.

      • releaseAllLocks

        void releaseAllLocks(java.lang.String userName)
        Releases all the locks from the application features which are being locked by the userName. This method returns list of all the features which are currently being locked by the userName.
        Parameters:
        userName - String The name of the user which has taken the lock on the application features.

      • getAllFeaturesLockedByUser

        java.util.List<LockStatus> getAllFeaturesLockedByUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Returns the list of all the application features which are being locked by the userName passed.
        Parameters:
        userName - String The name of the user which has taken the lock on the application features.
        Returns:
        List <{@link LockStatus}>The list of all the features which are currently being locked by the user.
